questions.question: der Herausgeber (Hrsg.) = ?
questions.notes: Correct! User was uncertain but got it right

questions.question: überarbeitet = ?
questions.notes: Close! Meant 'reworked' but correct answer is 'revised'. Spelling error + slightly wrong translation

questions.question: to publish = ? (German)
questions.notes: Incorrect. 'verlegen' can mean 'to publish' as publisher's action, but standard term is 'erscheinen' (to be published/appear)

questions.question: monograph = ? (German)
questions.notes: Close but wrong gender and ending. Correct: 'die Monographie' (feminine, -ie ending)

questions.question: Fill blank: Ich __ das Wort im Wörterbuch __. (nachschlagen)
questions.user_answer: Ich suche das Wort im Wörterbuch nach
questions.notes: Used 'suchen nach' instead of 'nachschlagen'. Correct: 'Ich schlage das Wort im Wörterbuch nach.'

questions.question: Fill blank: Das Buch __ von Springer Verlag __. (erscheinen, past)
questions.user_answer: Das Buch ist von Springer Verlag verliegen
questions.notes: 'verliegen' is not a word. Correct: 'ist erschienen' (past participle of erscheinen)

session_notes: Good progress on library vocabulary (66.67%). Strong on: reading bibliographic information, basic translations (Katalog, Herausgeber, Auflage). Needs practice: German verbs (erscheinen, nachschlagen), noun gender/endings (die Monographie not der Monograf), precise translations (revised vs. reworked).
chat_context_summary: Second quiz session. Practicing library search vocabulary (topic-003) that was introduced earlier. User showed good comprehension of bibliographic information reading but struggled with verb conjugations and precise German grammar.
